titleStmt.title: A warning from the Lord God to the inhabitants of the town and county of Warwick that they may repent and turn to the Lord with their whole hearts before it be too late.
titleStmt.author: Bourne, Edward, d. 1708.

notesStmt.note: Dated and signed at end: Worcester the third of the second moneth, 1661; Edward Bourne.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
